t: How do I contact Amazon customer service?

s: Amazon.com.tr, kredi ve banka kartı dahil olmak üzere çok sayıda ödeme seçeneği sunar.

On February 4, I ordered Columbia Peakfreak 2 shoes from Amazon Turkey, but the order from the Amazon Germany store was canceled on February 19. They claimed the cancellation was due to the address format, insisting on including the name and surname in the main part of the address.
